Package gameutils

Interface Summary
Element An Element that can be added to a Screen.
InputListener An all-in-one class that has all the basic input methods.
Screen A Screen is a game state.
 

Class Summary
Animation A convenience Animation class used to animate 2D sprites.
Art A class that stores Images.
BasicScreen Takes care of most abstract methods.
Game Game is the main class that must be extended by the user.
Input Handles key, mouse, and mouse motion input.
InputAdapter Implements the methods in InputListener so you wouldn't have to implement the ones you don't need.
MenuPage A MenuPage is a Screen that holds and organizes a set of Widgets.
Menus Menus organizes a group of MenuPages.
Score Stores the score and high score.
Sound A class that stores sound clips.
